cookie.title: We Use Cookies
cookie.description: We use cookies to analyze website traffic and improve your browsing experience. By clicking "Accept", you consent to our use of cookies.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Oops! The page you're looking for seems to have wandered off.
notFound.descriptionSub: The link might be broken, or the page may no longer exist.

pwaPrompt.title: Add to Home Screen
pwaPrompt.description: Add this website to your home screen for a faster, smoother app experience!

coursesPage.title: Choose Your Learning Journey
coursesPage.subtitle: Learn to code from scratch and become an App development wizard

courses.title: Peter Pan's iOS App Development
courses.description: In just 8 weeks, 2 evenings per week, master core programming concepts and the latest Swift, iOS, and Xcode technologies. Become a cool iOS App development wizard and unlock your second career in app work, freelancing, or entrepreneurship!

courses.title: iOS App Development for Liberal Arts Learners
courses.description: Tailored for liberal arts students, learn programming from zero with step-by-step guidance! In just 10 weeks, one evening per week, master core programming concepts and become a cool iOS App development wizard!

courses.title: Peter Pan's Flutter Cross-Platform App Development
courses.description: Learn the latest Flutter cross-platform app development technologies—Dart, Flutter SDK, VS Code—and become a cool Flutter App development wizard. Unlock your second career in app work, freelancing, or entrepreneurship!
